charaepi_ch0196_10_fleurdelis/2301_1101_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was training in the
mountains when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] suddenly found [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="himself" F="herself" ]
enveloped in fog.

Soon after, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] spotted a member of Team Break
creeping suspiciously through the fog.
charaepi_ch0196_10_fleurdelis/2301_1201_:
Wh-what is this fog?! It was perfectly clear until
just a few seconds ago!

Hm... Perhaps this is the power of some mysterious
Pokémon hiding in the depths of the mountains!

Hehehe... In that case, I am definitely going
to capture it and make its power ALL MINE!
Thinking only of yourself... What a fool.
Wh-what?! Who said that?!

I...have no idea what’s happening, b-but I’ve got
a bad feeling about this.
R-run away!
charaepi_ch0196_10_fleurdelis/2301_1101_: The Team Break member fled the scene...
charaepi_ch0196_10_fleurdelis/2301_1201_:
Hmph. Only motivated by self-preservation? What
scum, utterly devoid of conviction.
charaepi_ch0196_10_fleurdelis/2301_0401_:
I am merely here to keep a promise I made to
a friend.
charaepi_ch0196_10_fleurdelis/2301_0302_: Are you training here, too, Lysandre?
charaepi_ch0196_10_fleurdelis/2301_0402_:
Training? Not exactly, but that’s not far from
the truth.
charaepi_ch0196_10_fleurdelis/2301_1201_:
Here in the mountains, far from the prying eyes
of others, I am preparing for the time that will
inevitably come...
Together here with Volcanion.
Volcanion expels steam from the arms on its back.

It’s said that Volcanion caused a steam explosion
that created plains where people now live...

Volcanion is a Pokémon that possesses tremendous
power—so much so that it’s spoken of in legends
as a “nation-building Pokémon.”

And so, I am thinking of using that power for
the sake of the world.

Power is not supposed to be used for selfish ends.
It’s to be used for the sake of the world.

I want to wipe this world clean and make
an even better world.
charaepi_ch0196_10_fleurdelis/2301_0401_: I do have my plans, of course, but...
charaepi_ch0196_10_fleurdelis/2301_0302_:
And just what are you planning to
do with this power?
charaepi_ch0196_10_fleurdelis/2301_0402_: *chuckle* There’s no need to put up your guard.
charaepi_ch0196_10_fleurdelis/2301_1201_: No, now is not the time for that.

Does a chosen one such as yourself truly have the
ability to change the future?
I’m observing you so I can answer that question.

I only intend to directly intervene if
someone appears who would do harm
to our beautiful world.

If that does indeed come to pass, I will use our
power to pass judgment on foolish humans and
recreate this world.
Aaaaaah!
It’s that man from before.

The deep recesses of these mountains are the
training grounds of many violent-mannered
sync pairs.
That man lacks both strength AND conviction.

This is not the sort of place someone like that
can safely return from...
I’m afraid I must take my leave.

It’s my hope that the next time we meet, there will
be no need for us to fight.
